description: A podcast app for the Statesmen Podcast that dynamically reads the show's RSS feed for the most updated episode. Built with React, MaterialUI and Redis.
picAlt: A screenshot of the home page of the Statesmen Podcast App.

description: Aether is a multiplayer music game built with Threejs, React Socket.io, and Firebase enabling users to play music in realtime and save creations to their profile.
picAlt: A screenshot of the home page of the Aether App.
